description:
Mid-sized frames accommodate all kinds of faces so everyone gets a clear view of the way ahead.

  • Happy lenses heighten contrast detail in challenging conditions, giving excellent clarity and detail
  • 5.5-base curve ARC spherical dual-layer lens with anti-fog and anti-scratch protection
  • ARC lens is thicker in the middle, tapered toward the edges for optically correct, distortion-free viewing from all angles
  • Flexible polyurethane frame conforms to any face for a comfortable fit
  • Scoop ventilation system combats lens fogging by forcing air through the frame
  • Triple-density face foam with moisture-wicking fleece
  • Dual-adjustment, silicone-ribbed strap
name: Spy+ Marshall Goggles - Unisex

specs.key: Visible Light Transmission (Red Rose w/Dark Blue + Li)
